Name: Tony DeCarlo
Bio: I majored in Computer Science at Towson University. Passionate about all things full stack web development. In my free time I enjoy video games, soccer, and working out.

Bio: Self-taught coder. GW Coding boot camp graduate and TA. All things Javascript enthusiast.
